{Earths Orbit - Prehistoric Earth}

The read out provided the only illumination of the one occupant 
cockpit of the small interstellar craft. It's jet back and stream 
lined hull was unmarred by insignias, it's pilot likewise sat 
brooding as he read the reports from Cybertron. This battle between 
transformers had been a long one, far longer than any of the others 
this pathetic dirt ball had ever seen or would see.

Reaching out the figures clawed hand stroked an orb on the panel in 
front of him, his ship smoothly beginning its decent into Earth's 
atmosphere, the angle causing great stress on the hull from the heat, 
the cabin he knew would be blistering hot to organics but to him it 
was unchanged, as he focused his attention on a qualified landing 
site he began reading out the energon levels the planet emitted. It 
didn't suprise him in the least that predacons would come here, nor 
maximals to protect this world.

What did surprise him was the metallic clank as his ship smashed into 
a stasis pod that also was descending. The pilot growled at the 
impact but didn't change course settling his craft in a jungled area 
of the planet and activating the dna scanner. Reports had said an 
alternate form to avoid energon build up would be required so he had 
checked up on the animals of earth settling on what he wanted.

As the sequencing took place, the craft slowly came to a halt resting 
lightly on the jungle floor. As it finished the crafts door slid open 
with a whispered hiss and stalking from the craft moved a jet black 
and purple panther that quickly moved into the wilderness. It's dark 
eyes scanned the forest as his tail lifted, the tip flipping down and 
a single pulse of energy erupting from the concealed weapon, striking 
home on the softened plating above the crafts energon supply bay. The 
explosion singed his dark forms fur as the crafts explosion sent 
flame and metal into the air, blasting a small hole into the ground.

Scanning the wreckage satisfied that the computers and specs of the 
craft would not be recovered the transformer slunk into the jungle 
activating his tracker and looking for the distinctive energy 
signatures of those in the current conflicts....
